title: Miami-Fort Lauderdale-West Palm Beach metro area population U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of residents has increased over the Year.
Number of residents is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of residents, about 6198782.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Number of residents about 5771731.0 was reached at Year 2012
